GUU4:ZtDYT9gZEcDb{4P.text:
Speed Modifier must be >= .2 or it breaks

Speed modifier is inverse (bigger = slower)
Delay divisor is not (bigger = faster)

EHCmRE1x:MobtPVD4/oL.text: Wouldn't set the delay divisor to much higher than 5. It's important to make sure that each node broadcasts their finished turns at slightly different times. (The lower you go the slower the whole process gets)

8me5M[3CPxc!5:v2rKUa.text:
The empty space placed is placed at the corresponding location in the Trade relationships by ID to make sure the order in which relationships are built doesn't matter.

If the list has items, then items can be inserted at locations, if it has no items then things can only be added, which ruins the order

wI[qb+D1c51mAQZlKcfU.text:
As noted in the Add City block, this does not need to be in any particular order. 

At least that's the theory... still some bugs to work out
